content: {"Name": "Schenectady Community Action Program", "Entity_Id": 385, "Category": "WIC /SNAP Assistance", "Subcategory": "SNAP (Food Stamps) Registration Assistance", "Organization": "Schenectady Community Action Program", "More_Information": "call to verify hours of operation and to see if an appointment is required", "Counties": ["Schenectady"], "Location": "", "Address": "913 Albany Street", "City": "Schenectady", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12307", "Phone": "(518) 374-9181", "Hours_of_Operation": "Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday 8:30am-4:30pm (must arrive before 4); Wednesday 8:30am-6:30pm except the first Wednesday of the month", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "http://scapny.org/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.804783", "Longitude": "-73.933078", "Last_Updated": "06-25-2025", "icon": "star-A12AFF", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
